T04n1002u_001:2: trailokye vyavahāramātre sati paramārthabhimānāt tattvārthānavagāhibhiḥ sattvairvastusvabhāvavivekadvāreṇa viparyayajñānasaṃprāptaye [śāstra]racaneyam
T04n1002u_001:4: atrānatidūre'pyālokamātrayā bhāsamāne deśe rajjurūpasādhāraṇadharmopalabdhito bhrāntyā sarpa evāyamiti niścayarūpaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate |
T04n1002u_001:10: tadanupalabdhau rajjūpalabdhirapi sarpa iti buddhivad bhramamātrā kutrāpi līyate |
T04n1002u_001:11: atha yathā rajjujñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ tathā te'pyavayavāḥ |
T04n1002u_001:12: tatkhaṇḍacchedādiṣu dṛśyamāneṣu teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ na nirdhāryate |
T04n1002u_001:16: yathāvayavādivibhāgena pṛthagrajjvādiṣu vicāryamāṇeṣu svarūpānupalabdhito rajjvādibuddhirapi sarpa iti buddhivada bhrāntā tathā digbhāgādīnapekṣya ghaṭapaṭādayo vyavahārajñānagocaro yāvat sarve cidātmakā eva (āśritā eva) |
T04n1002u_001:20: yattvāśritavastūnāṃ sarveṣāmantyaṃ paramāṇudravyaṃ niravayavamekaṃ tasyāpyacintyasvarūpatvenānupalabhyatvāt tadapi khapuṣpamālāśaśaśṛṅgādibhiḥ samamavastukameva sidhyate |
T04n1002u_001:21: kiṃca kathamacintyannakṣaṇatvahetunā paramāṇudravyaṃ sadapyekaṃ nāstīti jñātuṃ śakyate |
T04n1002u_001:23: tathā hi yathā satāṃ ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭādīnāṃ dravyāṇi prākpatyagādinānādigbhāgavattvān nānāvayavīni vidyante yadi paramāṇudravyamapyasti tadāvaśya digbhāganānātvāt prākpratyagādinānāvayavāḥ svīkartavyāḥ |
T04n1002u_001:24: satsu tu nānāvayaveṣu paramāṇudravyamekaṃ na sidhyate |
T04n1002u_001:33: bhrāntaṃ tadapyasamyakvād yathā bhānaṃ tathāsti na |
T04n1002u_001:35: bhrāntyāpi tayā yad dravyasvarūpaṃ jñāyate tathārūpaṃ dravyaṃ tannāsti |
T04n1002u_001:40: tathā hi loke'pi bījādijanakābhāve janyāṅkurādayaḥ santīti dharma īdṛṅ na dṛśyate |
T04n1002u_001:44: yathoktaprakāreṇāśritamātre sati trailokye'smin yo ghaṭādisthūlabuddhiṃ vihāya sūkṣmabuddhyā dravyahīnaṃ vyavahāramātraṃ niścinoti yathā rajjjau sarpa iti jñānādāgatabhayo viśeṣaṃ vicārya rajjuniścaye sarpānnirbhayo bhavati tathā rāgādijanakavastūni parīkṣya tenāpi rāgādikleśajālāni suṣṭhu akṛcchreṇa acireṇaiva tyajyante |
T04n1002u_001:48: ghaṭādyartheṣu sadrūpeṇa cintyamāneṣu ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ śakaṭaḥ iti vyavahārānābadhnanti tathā pūrvasiddhato vyavahāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04n1002u_001:49: tataḥ paraṃ rāgādikleśāṃs tyaktukāmena yathoktaparamārthalakṣaṇena vastūni parīkṣitavyāni |
T04n1002u_001:50: tathā parīkṣyamāṇeṣu vastuṣu kāmādikteśajālāni na punarutpadyante ||
